entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:39 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Frances 7:00 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:14 PM CST Thursday 29 December 2022
